To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Various radio excerpts including: an announcer introducing Edward Matthews, who begins to perform 'My Love'; an announcer introducing 'Johnny', who performs 'Little Old Rag Doll'; various 'Johnny Presents' Philip Morris program excerpts featuring Audrey Marsh, Beverly, Jack Smith, Max Marcin, the Swing Fourteen, John Field, Charles O'Connor, Ray Bloch, and Johnny Roventini; and an unidentified radio drama excerpt, possibly also part of the 'Johnny Presents' Philip Morris program.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
